title: Challenges Confronting Monetary Policy
content: - 20 -   References   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (2009a).  “FOMC Statement,” press   release, March 18,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20090318a.htm.    ------ (2009b).  “FOMC Statement,” press release, November 4,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20091104a.htm.    ------ (2011a).  “FOMC Statement,” press release, August 9,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20110809a.htm.    ------ (2011b).  “Minutes of the Federal Open Market Committee, June 21-22, 2011,”   press release, July 12,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20110712a.htm.    ------ (2012a).  “Federal Reserve Issues FOMC Statement,” press release, September 13,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20120913a.htm.    ------ (2012b).  “Federal Reserve Issues FOMC Statement,” press release, December 12,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20121212a.htm.    ------ (2013).  “Minutes of the Federal Open Market Committee, December 11-12, 2012,”   press release, January 3,   www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/monetary/20130103a.htm. Klee, Daniel W. Quinn, and Alexander H.   Boote (2013).  “The Federal Reserve’s Balance Sheet and Earnings:  A Primer   and Projections,” Finance and Economics Discussion Series 2013-01.    Washington:  Board of Governors, January,   www.federalreserve.gov/pubs/feds/2013/201301/201301abs.html.
